title: Alesha Dixon shows off her post-baby body in plunging jumpsuit as she films for America's Got Talent
text:
She and her partner Azuka Ononye welcomed their new daughter Anaya into the world seven weeks ago.

And Alesha Dixon looked absolutely incredible as she showed off her post-baby body while arriving to film for America's Got Talent in Los Angeles, California on Saturday.

Stepping out into the sunshine, the former Mis. Teeq star, 41, wowed as she flaunted her toned legs in a perilously plunging floral blue jumpsuit.

Stunning: Alesha Dixon, 41, looked incredible as she showed off her post-baby body while arriving to film for America's Got Talent in Los Angeles, California on Saturday

Alesha, who also shares daughter Azura, seven, with Azuka, wowed in the striking pale blue number with pink flower designs and a pretty lace trim.

The songstress showed off her pretty features by scraping her glossy locks into a high ponytail, and she shielded herself from the sunny rays with a pair of circular shades.

The beauty, who has replaced Mel B on the judging panel, boosted her height in a pair of towering nude-coloured heels as she strutted along in style.

Earlier in the week, Alesha said she felt like the 'luckiest girl on the planet' as she shared the first photo of her seven-week-old daughter Anaya.

Babe: Stepping out into the sunshine, the former Mis. Teeq star wowed as she showed off her toned legs in a perilously plunging floral blue jumpsuit

In her confirmation message shared with her Instagram followers, she wrote: 'Anaya Safiya born 20.08.19. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.'

Alesha confirmed she was expecting her second child with Azuka in May, during an appearance on Britain’s Got Talent.

Taking to the stage during the first live show of the series, Alesha revealed her prominent baby bump in a form-fitting dress.

Her announcement was pre-empted by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who referenced to her pregnancy in a Morcambe and Wise style opening skit.

Pretty: The songstress showed off her pretty features by scraping her glossy locks into a high ponytail, and she shielded herself from the sunny rays with a pair of shades

Alesha later admitted she was ecstatic to be expecting her second child with her husband. 'It's a lovely place to celebrate it,' she said, gesturing to the audience gathered inside London's Hammersmith Apollo.

Alesha had previously confessed she felt "so much more relaxed" in her second pregnancy.

She said: 'I feel great actually, I feel so much more relaxed this time around. It's great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you're like, "I've got this."

'Azura is amazing, she's doing really well and kisses me every day and making sure everything's okay. She's so excited, beyond excited.'
description: Alesha Dixon, 41, looked absolutely incredible as she showed off her post-baby body while arriving to film for America's Got Talent in Los Angeles, California on Saturday.
